Animals.name: Puff
Animals.description: This animal is a very good friend of mine, brings a smile on my face everyday even in my worst days. Sadly I am going away for college and I do not want my animal to feel trapped in my small college dorm. This is a very kind animal which can be both active and a amazing sofa couch buddy.
